item.title: Hot Spot: Sotheby's S|2 at Montauk's The Surf Lodge on Sotheby's Blog
item.description:
Hot Spot: Sotheby's S|2 at Montauk's The Surf Lodge on Sotheby's Blog

At the New York edition of the NADA art fair this past May, visitors who know of dealer and artist Joel Mesler might have been momentarily shocked to see a booth offering works from The Estate of Joel Mesler.

item.title: Bonhams
item.description:
Bonhams

SOYUZ 18-FLOWN NAVIGATIONAL CELESTIAL GLOBE Black metal alloy celestial globe, approx 11.5 cm in diameter, etched with circles of celestial latitude and longitude, constellation figures, ecliptic and perpendicular of ecliptic. Major stars pierced for illumination from internal battery-powered bulbs (non-functioning). Rotating within plastic armature. PROVENANCE: Cosmonaut Pyotr Klimuk; Sotheby's Russian Space History, 1993, lot 91.

item.title: Jon Pylypchuk, 'the pack (i will always love you)', 2010, Mona Bismarck American Center | Artsy
item.description:
Jon Pylypchuk, 'the pack (i will always love you)', 2010, Mona Bismarck American Center | Artsy

Jon Pylypchuk, formerly a founding member of Manitoba's The Royal Art Lodge cooperative (1996-2008), is known for his sculptures of puppet-like creatures crafted from old clothes, stuffed toys, wood, and other refuse, sometimes given diorama-like installations that resemble miniature shantytowns. His mixed-media collages and works on paper display a similarly scavenged, folkloric aesthetic.

waiting for pancakes

item.title: Pentagram brings Mastercard into digital age with logo redesign
item.description:
Pentagram brings Mastercard into digital age with logo redesign

Design agency Pentagram has created a new logo and visual identity for Mastercard, the credit card company's first branding redesign in 20 years. The new design retains the two overlapping red and yellow circles, but swaps the stripes in the central portion for a block orange colour.

item.title: Vajrasana retreat centre review - magnificent, modern Buddhist haven
item.description:
Vajrasana retreat centre review - magnificent, modern Buddhist haven

"My name is Maitrivajri," says the lady waiting at the entrance to a smart black barn, deep in the Suffolk countryside. "It means a diamond thunderbolt of universal loving kindness." It's not quite what you expect to encounter on the edge of the sleepy village of Walsham-le-Willows, but then this is no ordinary barn.

item.title: JI-SHI Urban Harvest / Atelier I-N-D-J
item.description:
JI-SHI Urban Harvest / Atelier I-N-D-J

The restaurant sits in the outskirts of Shanghai in the newly formed Disney town, with views from within over a large lake. Occupying a concrete framed building the design seeks to occupy this banal framework; exposing slabs, columns and ductwork whilst shrouding the honest backdrop in certain areas with planes of plaster and ply.
